meanings.sent1: Histaminases help to break down histamine in the body.
meanings.sent2: The histaminases in the stomach work to break down histamine from food.
meanings.sent3: The histaminases at the party were like little cleaners, breaking down histamine molecules.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like histaminases, breaking down the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The histaminases acted like tiny scissors, cutting through the histamine.

meanings.definition: Substances that inhibit the action of histamine.
meanings.sent1: Histaminases can block the effects of histamine in the body.
meanings.sent2: The histaminases in the medication help to reduce allergic reactions.
meanings.sent3: The histaminases in the game were like secret agents, stopping histamine from causing trouble.
meanings.sent4: Her words acted as histaminases, preventing any further misunderstandings.
meanings.sent5: The histaminases were like shields, protecting the body from histamine attacks.
